name: Visual Sitemap
description:
Create beautiful visual sitemaps in seconds.


With easy-to-use text editor to design custom tree diagrams and sitemaps straight into FigJam.


Looking for extra design-fanciness? Copy/Paste a visual sitemap into Figma and gain access to the fullest level of customization.


—————————————————————————


HOW TO

  • Open the plugin and start typing on the editor. You can copy/paste an existing list or start from scratch.
  • Each list element will generate a separate node on the visual sitemap.
  • To connect and create a hierarchy among the nodes, use Tab ↹ key and indent any list element.
